args.natural_language_statement: Let z in C with |z| < 1. Prove that sum_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n / n ≤ |z| / (1 - |z|).

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Filter Finset
open scoped Topology
open Real
/-- The sum of the series `∑' n : ℕ, (|z| ^ n / n)` is bounded above by `|z| / (1 - |z|)`. -/

/-- Let z in C with |z| < 1. Prove that sum_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n / n ≤ |z| / (1 - |z|). -/
theorem tsum_geometric_of_abs_lt_one_ext {z : ℂ} (hz : ‖z‖ < 1) :
    ∑' n : ℕ, (‖z‖ ^ n / n) ≤ ‖z‖ / (1 - ‖z‖) := sorry"}
